ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Guild Loot Rules
ygData.msgSnippet: Glad to see that DC is like that - I think there are a LOT of great guilds on Xegony like DC, and VS, and my guild - but see Brill s post a few down about what
ygData.messageBody:
Glad to see that DC is like that - I think there are a LOT of great guilds
on Xegony like DC, and VS, and my guild - but see Brill's post a few down
about what often typifies the "Ghetto" Server...

I'd love to join you guys on a raid sometime - give me a tell or send me an
email. You guys (and another guild I believe) beat us up to Hate Monday (I
hope no BP's dropped <veg>) But it was a good night for DoK as we got three
members epic items instead of going to Hate.

Slyde Katzenjammer
54 Bard-Xegony
Dragons of Kel'Dar


-----Original Message-----
From: Robert(Bob) Smith [mailto:rws1111@...]
Sent: Wednesday, May 09, 2001 8:07 AM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] Re: Guild Loot Rules


> Sounds like you are in a great guilds where people work
> together for the common good. Your lucky - that's not
> very common (especially from what I've seen on Xegony).
>

Bah! Let me know when you want to come on a DC raid, Slyde, you might
be surprised with what you see. (Maybe this is why DC was
tagged "Friendliest Uber Guild on Xegony" -- not that I would
consider us "Uber".)
